elements.label: What data or other resources will be generated or reused in this research?
How will the data be organised and documented to ensure that it can be understood?  What additional information will someone else need to understand each data file?
Where will the data be stored and backed up during the project?  How will you check that the data can be restored from backups?
Does the data have any ethical, Data Protection or IPR issues?  How will these be managed?
Which data do you plan to keep and for how long?  Which will be deleted at the end of the project?
How will the retained data be preserved?
Which data will be shared and how?
Are any restrictions on data sharing required?
